page.title: 06LEISURE TIME
page.content: AYSHEA, CAROLINE AND VIRGINIA- Each summer during the school holidays we go to the{Play Scheme}at the{Community {Centre.}There are lots of different things to do. If you feel energetic there are games of{rounders, cricket, {badminton}or{table tennis}or you can make models, sew, paint or make things with clay. EMMA and JANE- We belong to two{ {Brass Bands}which take up a lot of our spare time. One is our{School Band} and the other is{Warrington Youth {Band.}The{Youth Band}has 32 players and altogether we have about 800 pieces of{music. }We practise twice a week and enjoy both playing and marching. During the summer we are going with the band on a tour of {Germany.
